content: DX 351 MX Powder-actuated tool Fully automatic, high-productivity, compact powder actuated tool for fastening collated nails ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features High productivity – fully automatic piston return and cartridge transport With the magazine 10 fasteners can be driven in quick succession without reloading Very user-friendly – light, low recoil, low noise Adjustable power regulation for optimal control of fastener settings Meets ANSI standard A10.3 and OSHA requirements for low-velocity tools Applications Drywall track fastening in soft and tough concrete using collated fasteners For fastening Hilti electrical elements featuring a turbine friction fit support ### TECHNICAL DATA:Dimensions (LxWxH): 15.9 x 2.2 x 6.5 inWeight: 5.4 lb.Cartridge type: .27 caliber short, 6.8/11 M10 Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 15.9 x 2.2 x 6.5 in | Weight | 5.4 lb | Fastener Intake | Collated | Fastener length range | 0.47 - 1.06 in | Cartridge type | .27 caliber short, 6.8/11 M10 | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | No | Hilti Connect | Yes | Power (max.) | 245 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-P8S-351 ### ITEMS- 3591512 -
